If you have development experience creating a custom module for this is fairly straight forward. I recommend reading the HubSpot docs - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/getting-started>

The building blocks for this module would be:
1. A repeating group with an image field inside (or just a repeating field - depends how flexible you need it to be)
2. Some CSS and HTML for the grid.
Alternatively you can use the off-the-shelf HubSpot core modules and build it using the image module and drag-and-drop. However, you’d still need to style it :slightly_smiling_face:

<@UQERM7BLY> thanks for the response! With your suggestions and some input from the HS community forums, I was able to get this working. 
 
I was able to use the field groups with an image module and URL module within it. I then could look over the fields and add some styling to get the layout/functionality I wanted.
